definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: In the base, The variable offset, dual-crisscross and amplitude limit combustion control system is designed.
sentences.chinese: 并在此基础上设计出变偏置双交叉限幅燃烧控制系统。

sentences.english: The integrator time constant is tunable by varying a reference bias current.
sentences.chinese: 该积分器的时间常数由参考偏置电流控制。

sentences.english: Offset paraboloid antenna has widely been utilized in small aperture antennas.
sentences.chinese: 偏置抛物面无线在小口径天线中得到了广泛的应用。

sentences.english: Finally, the shaped design of dual offset reflector antenna is studied.
sentences.chinese: 最后对双偏置反射面天线的赋形设计进行了研究。

sentences.english: A bootstrap MOS circuit is introduced for bias, which shows a good performance in power supply reject ratio .
sentences.chinese: 偏置电路采用自举基准源，具有良好的电源抑制比。

sentences.english: The design method of self-biased circulator with coplanar waveguide structure was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 最后，研究了共面波导自偏置环行器的设计方法。

sentences.english: The reverse-biased collector junction allows holes to pass it, but does not allow electrons to pass it.
sentences.chinese: 反向偏置的收集结允许空穴和阻挡电子通过。

sentences.english: Another misconception is that of cathode biasing.
sentences.chinese: 另一个误解是，阴极偏置。

sentences.english: Silicon epitaxial planar type, very high-speed switching, bias stabilizing application.
sentences.chinese: 硅外延平面型，非常高速开关，偏置稳定的应用。

sentences.english: Based on this method, curvilinear polygons were offset on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 基于这个方法，在曲面上偏置曲线多边形。

sentences.english: The error torques include mass unbalances, compliances, bias torque, etc .
sentences.chinese: 误差力矩包括质量不平衡，柔性，偏置力短，等等。

sentences.english: The purpose was to provide reference for producing the shoulder of packaging machine.
sentences.chinese: 为圆形偏置翻领成型器的加工制作提供了理论依据。

sentences.english: Does biasing at max dissipation guarantee class A operation?
sentences.chinese: 是否偏置保证在最大耗散A级操作？

sentences.english: Each camera monitors a set of parallel conveyer rows with offset tube holders.
sentences.chinese: 每台相机监视一组有偏置管筒支架的平行传送机排。

sentences.english: As a kind of disk harrow, the offset harrow has its own advantages and disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 偏置耙作为圆盘耙的一种，具有自身优点，又有缺点。

sentences.english: Different bias voltage for the input buffer transistor.
sentences.chinese: 不同偏置电压的输入缓冲晶体管。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
